item.description:
Let's get together for a nice walk after work.  As with other walks here, expect some exploring (I'm getting more familiar with the trails slowly!), dirt, gravel, and paved trails, some short but steep inclines, some roots/branches to step around, and a pace of about 3 miles an hour.  We'll walk for about 1.5 hours- along the River trail up to the Blueberry Hill area and back down along the water, before taking the road back to the cars.  If there's time though,  I'd like to explore staying on the trail and heading out towards the back entrance and back to the cars...so please be comfortable exploring with me if you stick around for that portion.  Bug spray suggested (along your sneakers too to prevent ticks).  Also, some trails were muddy this weekend, so you may want to wear old sneakers that you don't mind getting dirty in case they're still drying out.  And some trails (and the meadows) have tall grass...so consider pants and socks. 

*note the $1 meetup fee to help Angela pay for the dues for our group.  There is a small chance I may need to cancel this walk due to another possible commitment that may arise.  If that happens, I'll cancel by the morning of.  Walk will be cancelled for inclement weather or lack of interest
item.how_to_find_us: Main lot- as you come off Asbury St bear right twice

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Walk at Bradley Palmer after work- take advantage of the great weather forecast!
